channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I Feel Betrayed’: Who Will Speak Up for the Israeli Women Held Hostage by Hamas?
item.description: In its campaign against gender-based violence, UN Women has all but ignored Hamas’s atrocities. Hostage families are speaking out.

item.title: Five things we learned from the House task force report on Trump assassination attempt
item.description: A House task force's investigative findings revealed new information about the shooter who tried to assassinate President-elect Donald Trump in Butler...

item.title: Biden admin report could slow Trump's efforts to unleash domestic natural gas, experts say
item.description: A report from the Biden administration on the environmental and economic impacts of increasing exports of liquefied natural gas could pose delays for ...

item.title: America Is Lessened With Adam Schiff In The Senate
item.description: If Schiff weren’t so hellbent on bringing down Trump, he might have realized that there ought to be an investigation of the Biden family.

item.title: CNN’s Reckless Smear Tactics Could Cost Them Big After Latest Court Ruling
item.description: Judge Henry found that CNN had "no evidence that Young did anything criminal or illegal" and yet went ahead with the "black market" accusation anyway.

item.title: 'It's offensive': GOP senator wages war on airline industry's ‘discriminatory pricing’ targets
item.description: Sen. Josh Hawley's bill bans airlines from offering bonuses tied to amenity fees and prohibits discriminatory pricing, calling practices "offensive."

item.title: FBI miffed over mystery drones above New Jersey
item.description: The mystery drones detected flying over New Jersey in recent weeks are "concerning" and the FBI does not know who is operating them, a senior bureau o...

item.title: Exclusive: Chinese National Who Allegedly Voted In Michigan Is Still On The Voter Rolls
item.description: A Chinese student at the University of Michigan is facing charges for noncitizen voting. The Federalist has learned he is still on the voter rolls.

item.title: White House, GOP at odds on expanding number of district court judges
item.description: The House is expected to vote on a bill on Wednesday that would significantly expand the number of district court judges, but President Biden could ve...

item.title: Six human smugglers arrested in connection to 2021 crash that killed dozens
item.description: Authorities have arrested six Guatemalan human smugglers linked to a 2021 semi-truck crash that killed over 50 migrants and injured over 100, the Depa...

item.title: Trump Should Swear Off Lawfare
item.description: He is right when he touts success as the best form of vengeance.

item.title: Corporate Media Prep To Blame Four Years Of Bidenflation On Second Trump Administration
item.description: If Americans weren’t fooled by the propaganda press’ inflation idiocy before the 2024 election, then they won’t fooled after it either.

item.title: The Affirmative Action Fight Comes to High Schools
item.description: The ‘Handicapper General’ interpretation of the equal protection clause must not stand.

item.title: ‘Our top priority’: GOP senator reveals 'transformational' bill Republicans want to pass in 2025
item.description: Sen. Lindsey Graham, R-S.C., said on Tuesday that Republicans want to pass a "transformational" border security bill in 2025, as the GOP is set to tak...

item.title: Paying for Trump Tax Cuts with Trump Tariffs Doesn’t Make Sense
item.description: Tariffs may make for a good campaign sound bite, but they make for terrible international relations and even worse economic policy.

item.title: McConnell's Senate money machine makes transition to Thune as new era begins
item.description: McConnell's aligned fundraising group is being outfitted with Thune allies as the Senate Republican leader prepares to hand over power.

item.title: Florida Democrat switches to Republican: 'Tired of being the party of protesting'
item.description: If last month's election wasn't painful enough for Florida Democrats, they're losing another state House seat after Rep. Susan Valdes announced that s...

item.title: Documentary Uncovers British Deep State That Deposed Prime Minister In 44 Days
item.description: Truss believes a political alignment is coming in Britain, and it is likely to be similar to Trump-style populism.

item.title: Republicans Can Help Workers without Helping Unions
item.description: What America’s working class actually wants is for political leaders to pursue a pro-worker rather than a pro-union agenda.

item.title: Kash Patel's confirmation prospects get a boost from GOP senators who want FBI 'de-politicized'
